alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Lower Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 1:40PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cameron and southwestern Vermilion Parishes through 215 PM CDT... At 140 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rockefeller Wildlife Range, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grand Chenier, Pecan Island, Rockefeller Wildlife Range, Creole and Rutherford Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
